actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to make a technical correction in the provision of the Economic Recovery Tax Act related to the election to have certain life interests qualify for the marital deduction.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, as amended by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981, to make a technical change relating to the qualification of pooled income fundss for the estate tax marital deduction.

titles.title: A bill to make a technical correction in the provision of the Economic Recovery Tax Act related to the election to have certain life interests qualify for the marital deduction.
